resources.containerColsHelp: # of Columns of the parent container. Optimizes images to load
resources.mediaPathHelp: Upload or select an image from the Media gallery.
resources.ctaRouteHelp: URL Path for the CTA. Ex[internal]:/aboutus, Ex[external]: http://www.nba.com
resources.imageTypeHelp: Format of image to be displayed
resources.useHomeChoiceLinkHelp: Uses ccLink. Set true if the destination resides in OCC environment ie: '/aboutus'
resources.ctaClickFullHelp: Set full area of the content block to be clicked.
